text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Pol ko Barnabas atiatir puvatɨgha, akar bar gavgavimɨn me mɨgei, “Ia Judaba, ga faragha Godɨn akamɨn ia mɨkeme. Ezɨ ia akɨrim ragha akar kam gasara. Egha ghaze, e ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir zurara itim inian kogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia oragh, ga uam akar kamɨn ia mɨkɨman kogham. Ga Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibav kɨmam.
